@PostConservativ I guess that's a 'no' then or you'd have caught my point.
@PostConservativ ever read any Isaiah Berlin during that fancy education of yours?
@PostConservativ what a waste of an education- and you'd think you'd have some basic knowledge of demographics from travelling so much
@PostConservativ also the US is not a white 'homeland'. My apartment is older than your country.
@PostConservativ @NataliaAntonova who's in charge shouldn't come down to something as superficial as race.
@PostConservativ do you ever worry that your racism is just a simple way to rationalise things you don't understand and unexamined biases?
@PostConservativ you're American? Fuck me. Have you read the inscription on the Statue of Liberty?
Love will win. Although in a way it's a shame we have to beat them with love, beating them with sticks would have been way more satisfying.
@PostConservativ you want to live in a state where ethnic tensions cause daily bloodshed?
@PostConservativ may I interrupt your furious googling (bet you tried Iceland!) to ask you to concede your "every other nation on Earth" BS?
@AbiWilks Amazing how you three (and others) are always written off by people who don't actually read your stuff.
@PostConservativ So? There are ethnic minorities in all of those countries that are fully enfranchised. You've yet to name an ethno-state.
This is what happens when you sack all the smart people. https://t.co/u2lgwslYZk
@PostConservativ it took me all of 2 mins to look that up.
@PostConservativ Israel is 20% Arab. Cameroon has 250 distinct ethnic groups. Saudi Arabia is 33% foreign nationals and 10% Afro-Asian.
Fuck me this is the funniest thing i've seen all year. https://t.co/NWSfpD6LsC
@PostConservativ Even feudal Europe didn't have ethnostates. Even ancient Rome wasn't an ethnostate. You're living in a racist fantasy.
#FreeSargon. Ideally, into the sea. https://t.co/z5tT4ZjDP9
@AbiWilks Same in Singapore: welfare is the bugbear of nearly everyone, but every discussion about it eventually leads to race.
@DonnaSotoMorett we're not going to convince racists that they don't have popular support. The argument comes off as deluded to them.
@DonnaSotoMorett don't think we should use language to try to hide how popular racism is. We're way past trying to stuff the genie back in
@DonnaSotoMorett it's a term that goes back over a century and has always had connotations of racism through association with fascism.

@preetbasson well then you must know less than nothing, since I had to correct several of your factual errors.
@preetbasson amazing how you people twist away from every argument you lose and just end up saying stuff everyone agrees with.
@preetbasson hacks are journalists. if you're not white then you're even dumber than i thought.
@preetbasson why do you care? your guy wants to do it all over again.
@preetbasson "let us be white supremacist bigots in peace or we'll keep electing tyrants! Don't question us or we'll bring down democracy!"
@preetbasson scurry back to your alternative fact safe space then. Sorry for throwing history at you, didn't realise how weak your ideas are
@preetbasson do you not follow the news? Congress passed a law to prevent Obama closing Gitmo. https://t.co/40daSWvRRu
@preetbasson Like his 2009 executive order to end torture? https://t.co/o3n44rLQV2
@preetbasson at what point does it stop being 'fake outrage'? why aren't people allowed to oppose and get back on with their lives?
@preetbasson Obama and Clinton ended torture. No evidence it happened under Bill Clinton either. Torture is a GOP pastime.
@preetbasson what do the left need to do? Quit their jobs and become full time protesters?
@preetbasson what about the thousands who do work for Amnesty and Stop the War, and the millions who donate?
@preetbasson where are you getting your news? Obama tried to close gitmo but was frustrated by GOP house. Left have always fought torture.
@preetbasson I remember when Fox News was the pro-Bush, pro-torture Iraq war cheerleader. It was the left that opposed.
@preetbasson You can't blame people for going on with their lives. What's the alternative? Not everyone can afford to work for Amnesty.
@preetbasson we marched in the biggest global protests ever over the Iraq war, the Bush admin and torture. The left always opposed this.
@preetbasson then how is outrage over something agreed to be barbaric and despicable "Fake Outrage"?
@preetbasson waterboarding is torture. Torture is illegal both domestically and internationally under the Geneva convention.
Just waiting for Nick Hancock to turn out to be an utter twat for the hat-trick.
@2010LeeHurst your torturer is trying to extract information, but doesn't know what that info is. Victims just say anything to make it stop.
@THETXEMBASSY who calls themselves 'alt left'? Who says Russian election interference involved casting illegal votes?
@TheYoungHag I prefer the Paxman approach: keep asking the same question until you get a yes or no answer.
